answers.answer: The MH hypoglycemia forum is "Diabetes Juvenile - Type 1" as type 1 in the past was usually diagnosed in children. It should be renamed to Diabetes - Type 1 as more and more adults are being discovered. Try posting there.

question: Forgive me for posting this here on the diabetes board but I didn't find one related to hypoglycemia.  This is probably the right place though, considering they are the opposite of each other.My husband was diagnosed with being hypoglycemic some years back.  Just recently has he been experiencing some of the symptoms.  We are trying to make changes in our diet  and eating more small meals or snacks instead of fewer large ones.  We are still working on getting the exercising part in motion.We have introduced more fresh veggies, low fat and low sugar foods, whole grains, reduced carbs and more protein.  Is this correct?  Also, would caffeine cause the blood sugar to drop?I look forward to your experienced input!
